summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Bertona Street, from West Viewmont Way to 38th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13946 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
